name: One Two Boat Racing
description:
Welcome to the wet wild world of One Two Boat Racing, where you need to use your reflexes and speed to stay in the lead, beat the competition, and be the first to reach the finish line. But there is more to winning than just speed. You'll need to evade pylons, blow by rocks, and make sure to avoid sludge or face wasting precious seconds and losing the race.

Download One Two Boat Racing today!

Recommended for two players and playable using a single PSP® system.



"PSP" is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item’s use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
